dcterms:creator: Pascal Pons
dcterms:description: Connect Four is a two-player board game where players take turns dropping tokens into a vertical grid, aiming to connect four of their tokens in a row, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
dcterms:title: Connect Four

dcterms:creator: Geoffrey Irving
dcterms:description: Pentago is a two-player board game where players place tokens on a board and attempt to connect five in a row, with the added complexity of rotating one of the four quadrants of the board after each turn.
dcterms:title: Pentago

dcterms:description: Oware is a traditional African board game that involves two players who take turns sowing seeds in pits, aiming to capture more seeds than the opponent. The game is characterized by its strategic depth and variable game length.
dcterms:title: Oware
